mapper.insert: INSERT INTO manager (office_id, name, passwd, role) VALUES (#{officeId}, #{name}, #{password}, #{role,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler})
mapper.update:
UPDATE manager
passwd=#{password},
nickname=#{nickname},
role=#{role,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler},
where manager_id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT m.manager_id AS id, m.office_id AS officeId, m.name AS name, m.role AS role FROM manager m WHERE m.name = #{name} AND m.passwd = #{password}
SELECT M.* FROM ( SELECT manager_id AS id, office_id AS officeId, name AS name, role AS role FROM manager ORDER BY manager_id ) M LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT manager_id AS id, office_id AS officeId, name AS name, role AS role FROM manager WHERE manager.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
